attributes.action: Silent electro magnetis trains for hs2
attributes.additional_details: If you absoluteley must go ahead with HS2, be aware that by the time it is completed, it will already be 'out of date'.  Silent trains are the future and will appease more people on the route.  Why try and build something in 20 years that's already old today.  Let's have some forward thinking which makes minium noise pollutioin.  Electro magnetic, green, clean, fast silent.  Look at Japan not Germany!  Lets move forward not back or you may as well buy a job lot of video recorders and have done!
